title: Researcher in Data Analysis, Signal Processing and Modelling
description: During the research, I designed a digital model of a 5m wind turbine blade in CAD, used CFD & FEA for monitoring, trained a failure mode recognition model using acoustic data, and applied machine learning in MATLAB for failure prediction, integrating the algorithm into ANSYS.

title: Researcher in CFD & FEA
description: I implemented one-way fluid-structure interaction to determine the pressure distribution on a floating IEA offshore wind turbine blade, mapped CFD pressure to FEA with 100% node matching, reduced blade thickness in FEA to simulate offshore erosion, cutting computational time by 60%, and achieved 86% accuracy in stress distribution patterns compared to the current state-of-the-art.
